description: The ListScrapers operation lists all of the scrapers in your account. This includes scrapers being created or deleted. You can optionally filter the returned list.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: (Optional) A list of key-value pairs to filter the list of scrapers returned. Keys include status, sourceArn, destinationArn, and alias. Filters on the same key are OR'd together, and filters on different keys are AND'd together. For example, status=ACTIVE&status=CREATING&alias=Test, will return all scrapers that have the alias Test, and are either in status ACTIVE or CREATING. To find all active scrapers that are sending metrics to a specific Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus workspace, you would use the ARN of the workspace in a query: status=ACTIVE&destinationArn=arn:aws:aps:us-east-1:123456789012:workspace/ws-example1-1234-abcd-56ef-123456789012 If this is included, it filters the results to only the scrapers that match the filter. (string) --- The name of the key to filter by. Currently supported filter keys are status, sourceArn, destinationArn, and alias. (list) --- The values of the given key by which to filter. (string) --- The value for a given key by which to filter.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Optional) The maximum number of scrapers to return in one ListScrapers operation. The range is 1-1000. If you omit this parameter, the default of 100 is used.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token indicating that there are more results to retrieve. You can use this token as part of your next ListScrapers operation to retrieve those results.

nested_items.name: scrapers
nested_items.description: A list of ScraperSummary structures giving information about scrapers in the account that match the filters provided.

nested_items.name: alias
nested_items.description: (Optional) A name associated with the scraper.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the scraper.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the scraper was created.

nested_items.name: destination
nested_items.description: The Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus workspace the scraper sends metrics to.

nested_items.name: ampConfiguration
nested_items.description: The Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus workspace to send metrics to.

nested_items.name: workspaceArn
nested_items.description: ARN of the Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus workspace.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the scraper was last modified.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that provides permissions for the scraper to discover and collect metrics on your behalf.

nested_items.name: roleConfiguration
nested_items.description: This structure displays information about the IAM roles used for cross-account scraping configuration.

nested_items.name: sourceRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role used in the source account to enable cross-account scraping. For information about the contents of this policy, see Cross-account setup.

nested_items.name: targetRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role used in the target account to enable cross-account scraping. For information about the contents of this policy, see Cross-account setup.

nested_items.name: scraperId
nested_items.description: The ID of the scraper.

nested_items.name: eksConfiguration
nested_items.description: The Amazon EKS cluster from which a scraper collects metrics.

nested_items.name: clusterArn
nested_items.description: ARN of the Amazon EKS cluster.

nested_items.name: securityGroupIds
nested_items.description: A list of the security group IDs for the Amazon EKS cluster VPC configuration.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: subnetIds
nested_items.description: A list of subnet IDs for the Amazon EKS cluster VPC configuration.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: statusCode
nested_items.description: The current status of the scraper.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: If there is a failure, the reason for the failure.
(string) ---
(string) ---
